SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AdjacencyListGraph<T>
The AdjacencyListGraph class represents a graph using an adjacency list.
AdjacencyMatrixGraph<T>
Represents an adjacency matrix implementation of a graph.
BaseScreen
Abstract class representing the base screen of the game.
Bomb
Represents a bomb entity in the game.
BombManager
Manages the placement and detonation of bombs in the game.
Character
Represents an abstract character in the game.
CollisionManager
Manages collision detection and resolution in the game.
CollisionTile
Represents a collision tile in the game.
Controller
Controller class that manages the interaction between the user interface and the game logic.
DamageManager
 
Direction
 
Enemy
Represents an enemy character in the game.
EnemyManager
The EnemyManager class is responsible for generating different types of enemies.
EnemyType
 
Entity
Represents a basic entity in the game world.
Graph<T>
Represents a generic graph interface.
Ia
Represents the artificial intelligence (AI) logic for controlling an enemy character in the game.
ICollide
The ICollide interface represents entities that can cause collisions and have associated side effects.
IUpdate
The IUpdate interface represents entities that can be updated, indicating that they may have behavior or state changes over time.
Main
 
MapGenerator
The MapGenerator class is responsible for generating game maps using a maze generation algorithm.
MatrixCor
The MatrixCor class represents a matrix coordinate with row and column values.
MazeGenerator
The MazeGenerator class is responsible for generating a maze graph using either an adjacency matrix or an adjacency list.
MenuScreen
Represents the main menu screen with options for starting a new game or closing the application.
PathFinder
The PathFinder class is responsible for finding the shortest path between two matrix coordinates in a graph.
Player
Represents the player character in the game.
ScreenA
Represents the game screen where the main gameplay occurs.
SideEffect
 
TemporalTile
Represents a temporal tile in the game, which has a limited duration.
TemporalTileManager
The TemporalTileManager class is responsible for generating temporal tiles with or without collision.
Tile
Represents a basic tile in the game.
TileManager
The TileManager class manages aspects related to tiles in the game, including the generation of collision and non-collision tiles, as well as handling different tile images based on the specified TileType.
TileType
 
Timer
The Timer class provides a simple timer functionality for measuring elapsed time.
Vector
The Vector class represents a 2D vector with components x and y.
WeightedNeighbor<T>
The WeightedNeighbor class represents a neighbor in a weighted graph with a specified node and weight.
